features: Blocks 94 Pcs for Toddlers: Designed for 1 2 3 4 year old, the block set includes 94 pcs made of soft foam with different colors and shapes so that encourage the toddler to create their own buildings.
Toys for Indoor or Outdoor: All blocks are waterproof and easy to clean, the kids can play it both indoor or outdoor, especially as bath toys which can float on the water and making bathing more fun.
Safe and Soft Stackable Blocks: Building blocks for toddlers are made of non-toxic BPA material, which is harmless to both kids and the environment, soft texture can protect kids from hurting.
Entertainment & Development: Blocks can develop kid's hand-eye coordination, color & shape recognition, counting and sorting. It allows kids to adjust the difficulty of the blocks as they get older.
Gift for 1 2 3 4 Year old Boys Girls: The soft building blocks with highly interactive function easily loved by children. Gift for boys and girls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Baby Ball Drop Toy Baby Piano Toy Baby Activity Table Toddler foam blocks Toddler foam blocks Doctor Cart Kit--Pink Recommended Age 1-3 Year old 1-3 Year old 1-3 Year old 1-3 Year old 1-3 Year old 2-4 Year old Material ABS Plastic Metal & ABS Plastic Plastic EVA Foam EVA Foam Plastic Quantity 46PCS 47PCS

Foam Blocks for Toddlers Designed for 1 2 3 4 year old boys and girls, the foam building block set includes 94 pcs made of soft foam with different colors and shapes so that encourage the toddler to create their own buildings. Toys for Indoor or Outdoor All building blocks are waterproof and easy to clean, the kids can play it both indoor or outdoor, especially as bathroom toys which can float on the water and making bathing more fun. Safe and Soft Stackable Blocks Building Blocks for toddlers are made of non-toxic BPA material, which is harmless to both kids and the environment, soft texture can protect kids from hurting.

What's the Size? The size of the blocks is moderate to ensure that baby’s hands can hold and play easily, at the same time, the parents do not worry about the risk of the swallow.The package size: 13.78* 8.46* 2.95 inch. How to Clean the Blocks? Please use the soft-bristled brush to dip in the water of detergent or detergent to clean it, then rinse it off with clean water.Please do not put in the washing machine for cleaning. The Range of the Ages Recommendation? Ideal toddler toys for 1 2 3 4 Year old Boys Girls.The soft building blocks with highly interactive function easily conquer the kids with great affection and charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for toddlers who love to spend time playing with blocks.
reviews.reviewText: Blocks are soft and sturdy at the same time. Perfect for toddlers. Colors are bright and so much fun for our toddlers. Great price, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a great set of "blocks" for kids. I really like that they are foam, easier to use and create with and safer for kids. This set comes with a bunch of different shapes and colors. It even comes with building guides, to help get the creative juices going! There are really ending building opportunities with this. Not only is it fun for the kids, it is a good learning tool too. And as a nice added bonus, it comes with a bag to store them in when your done because I cannot ever get anything back in the box!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic, colorful, building fun!
reviews.reviewText: Colorful, durable, soft and spongy. It's a classic toy that spans from babies to young children. My 6 yr old granddaughter even had fun building with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and easy to build with
reviews.reviewText: The colors and variety of shapes made these a hit with my grandson. When he builds and then knocks down his towers there is no noise or danger to his brother or to the dog.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected.
reviews.reviewText: Easy for little hands to grasp. Durable. Lightweight. Toddler safe building blocks. I was hopeful the blocks would be closer to the size my own kids has 20 years back. Significantly smaller, but just as much fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bundle of fun
reviews.reviewText: We originally saw and played with these at my optometry appointment. My son was so focused on building with them, I loved it. They are soft and vibrant. It came with a small pamphlet with ideas. We enjoy them very muhh CNN and we have a small bag we put them in when we travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The blocks were ok for little ones to play with. But there were not enough blocks to build half the items listed in the brochure. You have to purchase multiple sets to do that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has a smell
reviews.reviewText: My son said there was a chemical smell, he said they laid them out to air them out for a while because of the "off gassing." Grandson has not played with them yet, but I believe he will in a few month when he is more mobile. Product was as described and expected.
